en.question: What is an online ordering system for restaurants?
en.answer: An online ordering system for restaurants allows diners to place orders directly through a restaurant's website or app. It streamlines the ordering process, eliminating the need for third-party platforms and helping restaurants build a stronger connection with their customers.

en.question: How does Oddle's online ordering system help my restaurant?
en.answer: Oddle's online ordering system enables restaurants to create their own branded e-shop. It helps you manage orders efficiently, grow your customer base, and retain loyal diners—all while reducing reliance on commission-based platforms.

en.question: Why should I use an online ordering system instead of a marketplace?
en.answer: Unlike marketplaces that charge high commissions, an online ordering system gives you complete control over your brand and customer data. It's a cost-effective way to drive repeat sales and increase your profit margins.

en.question: What features should I look for in an online ordering system for restaurants?
en.answer: When selecting an online ordering system, it's important to consider features that enhance both functionality and customer experience. A customizable storefront allows businesses to reflect their brand identity, while seamless integration with payment gateways ensures smooth transactions. Tools for collecting customer data provide valuable insights, and marketing automation capabilities help drive engagement and increase sales.

en.question: Does Oddle's online ordering system integrate with delivery services?
en.answer: Yes, Oddle integrates with third-party logistics partners to streamline deliveries. This ensures that you can offer a seamless ordering and delivery experience to your customers.

en.question: How can an online ordering system help grow my restaurant's sales?
en.answer: By implementing an online ordering system, businesses can reach a wider customer base and extend their presence beyond physical locations. This system allows them to offer promotions that encourage repeat purchases while also collecting valuable customer data. With this data, businesses can run targeted marketing campaigns, boosting customer engagement and driving sales growth.

en.question: How does Oddle ensure a good customer experience with its online ordering system?
en.answer: Oddle provides a user-friendly interface for both restaurant owners and customers. Our system supports features like real-time order tracking, personalized promotions, and smooth payment processing to enhance customer satisfaction.

en.question: What is Oddle Loyalty?
en.answer: Oddle's Restaurant Loyalty CRM System is a seamless, easy-to-use digital loyalty software that rewards returning customers and simplifies diner engagement. By combining simple check-in rewards with customer insights, it helps restaurants build stronger relationships and boost repeat visits.

en.question: How does Oddle's loyalty rewards programme work?
en.answer: Unlike traditional points-based programmes, Oddle uses a simple check-in system where customers earn rewards just by visiting again. All diners at the table can check in—not just the payer—resulting in up to 4x more data captured. This data is invaluable for your remarketing efforts, enabling you to better understand diner behavior and craft personalized campaigns that drive engagement. With return vouchers and flexible incentives, the programme focuses on making loyalty easy for both customers and merchants. Diners can simply tap or scan to check in, making the process fast and frictionless.

en.answer: In Singapore, well-known establishments like Swee Choon, Barrio, Cenzo, and HJH Maimunah use Oddle's restaurant loyalty system to attract loyal customers and increase engagement through personalized return incentives. In Malaysia, popular spots like Flaaah The Bakery and Naj & Belle leverage Oddle's check-in rewards to encourage repeat visits and reward their diners without the hassle of traditional points systems.

en.question: Why is Oddle Loyalty the best rewards programme for restaurants?
en.answer: Oddle's innovative loyalty solution eliminates the complexity of traditional points-based rewards. Instead, it focuses on encouraging repeat visits through easy-to-implement check-in rewards. With Oddle's check-in solution, everyone at the table can check in—not just the payer—capturing the dining experience for all guests. This addresses one of the biggest flaws in traditional loyalty programmes that only reward the bill payer. Paired with Oddle Pass, the loyalty experience is even more seamless, offering customers and merchants a highly integrated solution.

en.answer: With Oddle's built-in CRM capabilities, you can access valuable customer insights like visit frequency and redemption behavior.
